title: Bug with riven Q sound
body: When I attack minions with my Q I can't hear the hit, or even the 3rd Q knockup. There is no sound. Is it a bug? If not how do I fix the sound? Thanks

replies.body: I think Sona's sounds are also bugged, sometimes in team fights when you E and then Q in rapid succession the sound just goes silent for a second.

OMG thank you some else noticed i was playing her (as normal lmao) and i was like i swear her q had a sound when it hit minions and just i was mental blank if she did or not and seeing this i can confirm this as well haha

I thought i was the only on, I hoped on 2 computers and use Battle Bunny Riven Skin for both and There still isn't any sound when i hit minions. It's like i'm hitting the air. I hope they fix it soon, kinda bugs me a bit
Omg you could be right! It could be a bug with the skin! I have sent a support ticket to Riot, they should get back to me tomorrow :)
YEET! Tell use when they do so we know what is happeneing
Hey man! They think it is a config file error, but I replied to them and said it is only happening with the Battle Bunny Riven skin. So now I have to wait another day for their response :P
No worries man! I'll keep you updated :)
It's so weird though! I told my brother to log onto his account and he can hear the sounds! But I can't I sent a ticket in because I don't know what to do
you could download a custom skin, use the launcher repair thing. or maybe the sound fx bar is muted
Yeah I repaired it and nothing happened, where is that option? All my sound on league is on 100
